participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Curious and reflective, enjoys learning new things and connecting with others.
participant_1.background: i'm pregnant with my first child. i read a book every week. i live with my husband in pennsylvania. i started a new job as a pa three months ago. my favorite kind of movie is a documentary.

participant_2.name: James
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and enthusiastic, loves to share experiences and engage in conversations.
participant_2.background: i am a piano teacher on the side. i enjoy exploring new parts of the city. my father played violin professionally. i play several instruments.
